roleSlot.description: A role/argument slot in a frame or situation type definition. Structurally parallel to pub.layers.resource#slot: both represent named positions with type constraints. roleSlot is ontology-level (what roles a frame type allows); resource slot is template-level (what variables a template exposes).

roleName.description: The role label (e.g., Agent, Patient, Theme, ARG0).

fillerTypeRefs.description: References to allowed filler types (pub.layers.ontology#typeDef AT-URIs).

collectionRef.description: AT-URI of a pub.layers.resource#collection constraining allowed fillers.

defaultValue.description: Default filler value if not explicitly filled.

constraints.description: Declarative constraints on fillers of this role (e.g., selectional restrictions, agreement requirements).

features.description: Open-ended features for this role slot (e.g., semantic type, animacy preference, optionality conditions).
